item.title: Tell me how to make where u (HAVE TO HAVE) the runes t ocast a spell
item.dc:creator: @d4rk_n0v4 d4rk n0v4
item.description:
@d4rk_n0v4 wrote:

search for this

public boolean HasItemAmount(int itemID, int itemAmount)

now change the last false to true
now your spells will be needing runes to cast
note: at some servers this boolean is working but they just deleted the runes needed from the spells (most of the times this is on pkservers)

Read full topic
item.source: Tell me how to make where u (HAVE TO HAVE) the runes t ocast a spell
